info.title: Kavita
info.description: Kavita provides a set of APIs that are authenticated by JWT. JWT token can be copied from local storage. Assume all fields of a payload are required. Built against v0.8.9.1

get.summary:
Returns true if OIDC authentication cookies are present and the API.Extensions.IdentityServiceExtensions.OpenIdConnect
scheme has been registered
get.description: Makes no guarantee about their validity

get.summary: Returns the current user, as it would from login
get.description: Does not return tokens for the user

post.summary: Update a user's password
Register the first user (admin) on the server. Will not do anything if an admin is already confirmed
Perform a login. Will send JWT Token of the logged in user back.

get.summary: Returns an up-to-date user account

post.summary: Refreshes the user's JWT token

get.summary: Get All Roles back. See API.Constants.PolicyConstants

post.summary:
Initiates the flow to update a user's email address.
            
If email is not setup, then the email address is not changed in this API. A confirmation link is sent/dumped which will
validate the email. It must be confirmed for the email to update.
Change the Age Rating restriction for the user
Update the user account. This can only affect Username, Email (will require confirming), Roles, and Library access.
post.description: Users who's API.Entities.AppUser.IdentityProvider is not API.Entities.Enums.IdentityProvider.Kavita cannot be edited if API.DTOs.Settings.OidcConfigDto.SyncUserSettings is true

get.summary: Requests the Invite Url for the AppUserId. Will return error if user is already validated.

parameters.name: withBaseUrl
parameters.description: Include the "https://ip:port/" in the generated link

post.summary: Invites a user to the server. Will generate a setup link for continuing setup. If email is not setup, a link will be presented to user to continue setup.
Last step in authentication flow, confirms the email token for email
Final step in email update change. Given a confirmation token and the email, this will finish the email change.
post.description: This will force connected clients to re-authenticate

post.summary: Will send user a link to update their password to their email or prompt them if not accessible
Resend an invite to a user already invited

get.summary: Returns the OPDS url for this user
Is the user's current email valid or not
Returns all Auth Keys with the account

post.summary: Rotate the Auth Key
Creates a new Auth Key for a user.

delete.summary: Delete the Auth Key

get.summary: Returns active reading sessions on the Server
Checks if an admin exists on the system. This is essentially a check to validate if the system has been set up.

post.summary: Returns a list of annotations for browsing

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Returns the annotations for the given chapter
Returns all annotations by Series
Returns the Annotation by Id. User must have access to annotation.

post.summary: Create a new Annotation for the user against a Chapter
Update the modifiable fields (Spoiler, highlight slot, and comment) for an annotation
Adds a like for the currently authenticated user if not already from the annotations with given ids
Removes likes for the currently authenticated user if present from the annotations with given ids

delete.summary: Delete the annotation for the user

post.summary: Removes annotations in bulk. Requires every annotation to be owned by the authenticated user
Exports annotations for the given users

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Exports Annotations for the User

requestBody.description: Export annotations with the given ids

get.summary: Retrieves information for the PDF and Epub reader. This will cache the file.
get.description: This only applies to Epub or PDF files

get.summary: This is an entry point to fetch resources from within an epub chapter/book.

This will return a list of mappings from ID -> page num. ID will be the xhtml key and page num will be the reading order
this is used to rewrite anchors in the book text so that we always load properly in our reader.
get.description: This is essentially building the table of contents

get.summary:
This returns a single page within the epub book. All html will be rewritten to be scoped within our reader,
all css is scoped, etc.
Gets a single chapter

delete.summary: Removes a Chapter

post.summary: Deletes multiple chapters and any volumes with no leftover chapters

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: The ID of the series

requestBody.description: The IDs of the chapters to be deleted

post.summary: Update chapter metadata

get.summary: Returns Ratings and Reviews for an individual Chapter
Returns all Collection tags for a given User

delete.summary: Removes the collection tag from the user

get.summary: Returns a single Collection tag by Id for a given user
Returns all collections that contain the Series for the user with the option to allow for promoted collections (non-user owned)
Checks if a collection exists with the name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If empty or null, will return true as that is invalid

post.summary:
Updates an existing tag with a new title, promotion status, and summary.
<remarks>UI does not contain controls to update title</remarks>
Promote/UnPromote multiple collections in one go. Will only update the authenticated user's collections and will only work if the user has promotion role
Delete multiple collections in one go
Adds multiple series to a collection. If tag id is 0, this will create a new tag.
For a given tag, update the summary if summary has changed and remove a set of series from the tag.

get.summary:
For the authenticated user, if they have an active Kavita+ subscription and a MAL username on record,
fetch their Mal interest stacks (including restacks)

post.summary: Imports a MAL Stack into Kavita

get.summary: Returns the color scape for a series
Returns the color scape for a volume
Returns the color scape for a chapter

post.summary: Return all Series that are in the current logged-in user's Want to Read list, filtered (deprecated, use v2)
post.description: This will be removed in v0.9.0

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: All chapter entities will load this data by default. Will not be maintained as of v0.8.1

post.summary: Gets series with the applied Filter
post.description: This is considered v1 and no longer used by Kavita, but will be supported for sometime. See series/v2

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Gets all recently added series. Obsolete, use recently-added-v2

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Returns all series for the library. Obsolete, use all-v2

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Replaces chapter cover image and locks it with a base64 encoded image. This will update the parent volume's cover image.

get.summary: Returns reading history events for a give or all users, broken up by day, and format

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If 0, defaults to all users, else just userId

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: If 0, defaults to all time, else just those days asked for

get.summary: Returns users with the top reads in the server
Get all progress events for a given chapter
Quick Reads are series that should be readable in less than 10 in total and are not Ongoing in release.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Quick Catchup Reads are series that should be readable in less than 10 in total and are Ongoing in release.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Highly Rated based on other users ratings. Will pull series with ratings > 4.0, weighted by count of other users.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Chooses a random genre and shows series that are in that without reading progress

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: genreId
parameters.description: Genre Id

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Series that are fully read by the user in no particular order

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Library to restrict series to

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Creates a new Device
Updates an existing Device

delete.summary: Deletes the device from the user

post.summary: Sends a collection of chapters to the user's device
Attempts to send a whole series to a device.

get.summary: Get my client devices
Get All user client devices

delete.summary: Removes the client device from DB

post.summary: Update the friendly name of the Device

get.summary: For a given volume, return the size in bytes
For a given chapter, return the size in bytes
For a series, return the size in bytes
Downloads all chapters within a volume. If the chapters are multiple zips, they will all be zipped up.
Returns the zip for a single chapter. If the chapter contains multiple files, they will be zipped.

post.summary: Downloads all bookmarks in a zip for
Creates or Updates the filter

get.summary: All Smart Filters for the authenticated user

delete.summary: Delete the smart filter for the authenticated user

post.summary: Encode the Filter
Decodes the Filter
Rename a Smart Filter given the filterId and new name

get.summary: List out the fonts
Returns a font file

delete.summary: Removes a font from the system

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If the font is in use by other users and an admin wants it deleted, they must confirm to force delete it. This is prompted in the UI.

get.summary: Returns if the given font is in use by any other user. System provided fonts will always return true.

post.summary: Manual upload

get.summary: No-op method that just returns Ok. Used for health checks in Docker containers.
Returns cover image for Chapter
Returns cover image for Library
Returns cover image for Volume
Returns cover image for Series

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Id of Series

get.summary: Returns cover image for Collection
Returns cover image for a Reading List
Returns image for a given bookmark page
get.description: This request is served unauthenticated, but user must be passed via api key to validate

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: Starts at 0

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key for user. Needed to authenticate request

parameters.name: imageOffset
parameters.description: Only applicable for Epubs - handles multiple images on one page

get.summary: Returns the image associated with a web-link
Returns the image associated with a publisher
Returns cover image for Person
Returns cover image for User
Returns a temp coverupload image
get.description: Requires Admin Role to perform upload

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename of file. This is used with upload/upload-by-url

put.summary: Syncs book progress with Kavita. Will attempt to save the underlying reader position if possible.

get.summary: Gets book progress from Kavita, if not found will return a 400

post.summary: Creates a new Library. Upon library creation, adds new library to all Admin accounts.

get.summary: Returns a list of directories for a given path. If path is empty, returns root drives.

post.summary: For each root, checks if there are any supported files at root to warn the user during library creation about an invalid setup

get.summary: Return a specific library
Return all libraries in the Server
Gets libraries for the given user that you also have access to
For a given library, generate the jump bar information

post.summary: Grants a user account access to a Library
Scans a given library for file changes.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, will ignore any optimizations to avoid file I/O and will treat similar to a first scan

post.summary: Enqueues a bunch of library scans
Scans a given library for file changes. If another scan task is in progress, will reschedule the invocation for 3 hours in future.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, will ignore any optimizations to avoid file I/O and will treat similar to a first scan

post.summary: Copy the library settings (adv tab + optional type) to a set of other libraries.
Given a valid path, will invoke either a Scan Series or Scan Library. If the folder does not exist within Kavita, the request will be ignored

delete.summary: Deletes the library and all series within it.
delete.description: This does not touch any files

delete.summary: Deletes multiple libraries and all series within it.
delete.description: This does not touch any files

get.summary: Checks if the library name exists or not

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If empty or null, will return true as that is invalid

post.summary: Updates an existing Library with new name, folders, and/or type.
post.description: Any folder or type change will invoke a scan.

get.summary: Returns the type of the underlying library
Checks if the user's license is valid or not
Has any license registered with the instance. Does not validate against Kavita+ API
Asks Kavita+ for the latest license info

parameters.name: forceCheck
parameters.description: Force checking the API and skip the 8-hour cache

delete.summary: Remove the Kavita+ License on the Server

post.summary: Updates server license
Resend the welcome email to the user

get.summary: Returns all applicable locales on the server
get.description: This can be cached as it will not change per version.

post.summary: Returns a list of all Series that is Kavita+ applicable to metadata match and the status of it

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

get.summary: Fetches genres from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all genres

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Context from which this API was invoked

schema.description:
For complex queries, Library has certain restrictions where the library should not be included in results.
This enum dictates which field to use for the lookup.

post.summary: Returns a list of Genres with counts for counts when Genre is on Series/Chapter

get.summary: Fetches people from the instance by role

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: role

get.summary: Fetches people from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all people

get.summary: Fetches all tags from the instance

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all tags

post.summary: Returns a list of Tags with counts for counts when Tag is on Series/Chapter

get.summary: Fetches all age ratings from the instance
get.description: This API is cached for 1 hour, varying by libraryIds

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all ratings

get.summary: Fetches all publication status' from the instance
get.description: This API is cached for 1 hour, varying by libraryIds

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all publication status

get.summary: Fetches all age languages from the libraries passed (or if none passed, all in the server)
get.description: This does not perform RBS for the user if they have Library access due to the non-sensitive nature of languages

parameters.name: libraryIds
parameters.description: String separated libraryIds or null for all ratings

get.summary: Returns all languages Kavita can accept
Given a language code returns the display name
Fetches the details needed from Kavita+ for Series Detail page
get.description: This will hit upstream K+ if the data in local db is 2 weeks old

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series Id

parameters.name: libraryType
parameters.description: Library Type

post.summary: Returns the Catalogue for Kavita's OPDS Service

get.summary: Returns the Catalogue for Kavita's OPDS Service
Get the User's Smart Filter series - Supports Pagination
Get the User's Smart Filters (Dashboard Context) - Supports Pagination
Get the User's Libraries - No Pagination Support
Get the User's Want to Read list - Supports Pagination
Get all Collections - Supports Pagination
Get Series for a given Collection - Supports Pagination
Get a User's Reading Lists - Supports Pagination
Returns individual items (chapters) from Reading List by ID - Supports Pagination
Returns Series from the Library - Supports Pagination
Returns Recently Added (Dashboard Feed) - Supports Pagination
Returns More In a Genre (Dashboard Feed) - Supports Pagination
Get the Recently Updated Series (Dashboard) - Pagination available, total pages will not be filled due to underlying implementation
Get the On Deck (Dashboard) - Supports Pagination
OPDS Search endpoint

Returns items for a given Volume
Gets items for a given Chapter
Downloads a file (user must have download permission)

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: User's API Key

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Not used. Only for Chunky to allow download links

get.summary: This returns a streamed image following OPDS-PS v1.2

parameters.name: saveProgress
parameters.description: Optional parameter. Can pass false and progress saving will be suppressed

post.summary: Saves the progress of a given chapter.

get.summary: Gets the Progress of a given chapter
Find a person by name or alias against a query string
Returns all roles for a Person

post.summary: Returns a list of authors and artists for browsing

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

post.summary: Updates the Person
Attempts to download the cover from CoversDB (Note: Not yet release in Kavita)

get.summary: Returns the top 20 series that the "person" is known for. This will use Average Rating when applicable (Kavita+ field), else it's a random sort
Returns all individual chapters by role. Limited to 20 results.

post.summary: Merges Persons into one, this action is irreversible
Ensure the alias is valid to be added. For example, the alias cannot be on another person or be the same as the current person name/alias.
Authenticate with the Server given an auth key. This will log you in by returning the user object and the JWT token.
post.description: This API is not fully built out and may require more information in later releases

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Auth key which will be used to authenticate and return a valid user token back

parameters.name: pluginName
parameters.description: Name of the Plugin

get.summary: Returns the version of the Kavita install
get.description: This will log unauthorized requests to Security log

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Required for authenticating to get result

get.summary: Returns the expiration (UTC) of the authenticated Auth key (or null if none set)
get.description: Will always return null if the Auth Key does not belong to this account

get.summary: Parse a string and return Parsed information from it. Does not support any directory fallback parsing

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: String to parse

parameters.name: libraryType
parameters.description: Determines the set of pattern matching to use

post.summary: Update the users' rating of the given series
Update the users' rating of the given chapter

get.summary: Overall rating from all Kavita users for a given Series
Overall rating from all Kavita users for a given Chapter
Returns the PDF for the chapterId.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Auth Key for authentication

parameters.name: extractPdf
parameters.description: Converts PDF into images per-page - Used for Mihon mainly

get.summary: Returns an image for a given chapter. Will perform bounding checks
get.description: This will cache the chapter images for reading

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description: Chapter Id

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page in question

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: User's API Key for authentication

parameters.name: extractPdf
parameters.description: Should Kavita extract pdf into images. Defaults to false.

get.summary: Returns a thumbnail for the given page number
Returns an image for a given bookmark series. Side effect: This will cache the bookmark images for reading.
get.description: We must use api key as bookmarks could be leaked to other users via the API

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Api key for the user the bookmarks are on

get.summary: Returns the file dimensions for all pages in a chapter. If the underlying chapter is PDF, use extractPDF to unpack as images.
get.description:
This has a side effect of caching the images.
            This will only be populated on archive filetypes and not in bookmark mode

get.summary: Returns various information about a Chapter. Side effect: This will cache the chapter images for reading.
get.description: This is generally the first call when attempting to read to allow pre-generation of assets needed for reading

parameters.name: extractPdf
parameters.description: Should Kavita extract pdf into images. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeDimensions
parameters.description: Include file dimensions. Only useful for image-based reading

get.summary: Returns various information about all bookmark files for a Series. Side effect: This will cache the bookmark images for reading.

parameters.name: seriesId
parameters.description: Series Id for all bookmarks

parameters.name: includeDimensions
parameters.description: Include file dimensions (extra I/O). Defaults to true.

post.summary: Marks a Series as read. All volumes and chapters will be marked as read during this process.
Marks a Series as Unread. All volumes and chapters will be marked as unread during this process.
Marks all chapters within a volume as unread
Marks all chapters within a volume as Read
Marks all chapters within a list of volumes as Read. All volumes must belong to the same Series.
Marks all chapters within a list of volumes as Unread. All volumes must belong to the same Series.
Marks all chapters within a list of series as Read.
Marks all chapters within a list of series as Unread.

get.summary: Returns Progress (page number) for a chapter for the logged in user

post.summary: Save page against Chapter for authenticated user

get.summary:
Continue point is the chapter which you should start reading again from. If there is no progress on a series, then the first chapter will be returned (non-special unless only specials).
Otherwise, loop through the chapters and volumes in order to find the next chapter which has progress.
Returns if the user has reading progress on the Series
Returns a list of bookmarked pages for a given Chapter

post.summary: Returns a list of all bookmarked pages for a User
Removes all bookmarks for all chapters linked to a Series
Removes all bookmarks for all chapters linked to a Series

get.summary: Returns all bookmarked pages for a given volume
Returns all bookmarked pages for a given series

post.summary: Bookmarks a page against a Chapter
post.description: This has a side effect of caching the chapter files to disk

post.summary: Removes a bookmarked page for a Chapter

get.summary: Returns the next logical chapter from the series.
Returns the previous logical chapter from the series.
For the current user, returns an estimate on how long it would take to finish reading the series.
get.description: For Epubs, this does not check words inside a chapter due to overhead so may not work in all cases.

get.summary: For the current user, returns an estimate on how long it would take to finish reading the chapter.
get.description: For Epubs, this does not check words inside a chapter due to overhead so may not work in all cases.

ageRating.description: The maximum age rating a user has access to. -1 if not applicable

includeUnknowns.description: Are Unknowns explicitly allowed against age rating

endingXPath.description: Ending point of the Highlight. Can be the same as API.DTOs.Reader.AnnotationDto.XPath

chapterTitle.description: Title of the TOC Chapter within Epub (not Chapter Entity)

context.description: A calculated selection of the surrounding text. This does not update after creation.

ageRating.description: The age rating of the series this annotation is linked to

AnnotationDto.description: Represents an annotation on a book

AnnotationSortOptions.description: All Sorting Options for a query related to Annotation Entity

coverImage.description: This is used to tell the UI if it should request a Cover Image or not. If null or empty, it has not been set.

itemCount.description: Number of Series in the Collection

lastSyncUtc.description: Last time Kavita Synced the Collection with an upstream source (for non Kavita sourced collections)

source.description: Who created/manages the list. Non-Kavita lists are not editable by the user, except to promote

sourceUrl.description: For Non-Kavita sourced collections, the url to sync from

totalSourceCount.description: Total number of items as of the last sync. Not applicable for Kavita managed collections.

missingSeriesFromSource.description:
A 
 separated string of all missing series

includeContinueFrom.description: Insert a "Continue From X" entry in OPDS fields to avoid finding your last reading point (Emulates Kavita's Continue button)

shareReviews.description: UI Site Global Setting: Should series reviews be shared with all users in the server

shareAnnotations.description: UI Site Global Setting: Share your annotations with other users

viewOtherAnnotations.description: UI Site Global Setting: See other users' annotations while reading

socialLibraries.description: UI Site Global Setting: For which libraries should social features be enabled

socialMaxAgeRating.description: UI Site Global Setting: Highest age rating for which social features are enabled

socialIncludeUnknowns.description: UI Site Global Setting: Enable social features for unknown age ratings

shareProfile.description: UI Site Global Setting: Enable sharing of Profile with other users

expiresAtUtc.description: An Optional time which the Key expires

provider.description: Kavita will have a short-lived key

part.description: A part represents the id of the anchor so we can scroll to it. 01_values.xhtml#h_sVZPaxUSy/

page.description: Page Number to load for the chapter

seriesFormat.description: Represents the format of the file

chapterTitle.description: Not required, will be filled out at API before saving to the DB

seriesFormat.description: Represents the format of the file

pageDimensions.description: List of all files with their inner archive structure maintained in filename and dimensions

doublePairs.description: For Double Page reader, this will contain snap points to ensure the reader always resumes on correct page

id.description: Not used - For parity with Series Filter

name.description: Not used - For parity with Series Filter

limitTo.description: Limit the number of rows returned. Defaults to not applying a limit (aka 0)

seriesCount.description: Number of Series this Entity is on

chapterCount.description: Number of Chapters this Entity is on

webLinks.description: Web links derived from the various id of external websites

roles.description: All roles as if returned by the /api/person/roles endpoint

seriesCount.description: Number of Series this Person is the Writer for

chapterCount.description: Number of Issues this Person is the Writer for

BrowsePersonDto.description: Used to browse writers and click in to see their series

id.description: Not used - For parity with Series Filter

name.description: Not used - For parity with Series Filter

limitTo.description: Limit the number of rows returned. Defaults to not applying a limit (aka 0)

seriesCount.description: Number of Series this Entity is on

chapterCount.description: Number of Chapters this Entity is on

files.description: The files that represent this Chapter

pagesRead.description: Calculated at API time. Number of pages read for this Chapter for logged-in user.

lastReadingProgressUtc.description: The last time a chapter was read by current authenticated user

lastReadingProgress.description: The last time a chapter was read by current authenticated user

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Series

ChapterDto.description:
A Chapter is the lowest grouping of a reading medium. A Chapter contains a set of MangaFiles which represents the underlying
file (abstracted from type).

chapterTitle.description: Chapter's title if set via ComicInfo.xml (Title field)

pages.description: Total Number of pages in this Chapter

isSpecial.description: If this is marked as a special in Kavita

subtitle.description: The subtitle to render on the reader

seriesTotalPagesRead.description: Total pages read for the series

pageDimensions.description: List of all files with their inner archive structure maintained in filename and dimensions

doublePairs.description: For Double Page reader, this will contain snap points to ensure the reader always resumes on correct page

ChapterInfoDto.description: Information about the Chapter for the Reader to render

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Series

count.description: Number in the TotalCount of issues

totalCount.description: Total number of issues for the series

wordCount.description: Number of Words for this chapter. Only applies to Epub

ChapterMetadataDto.description: Exclusively metadata about a given chapter

friendlyName.description: User-friendly name, defaults to generated name like "Chrome on Windows"

userAgent.description: Raw User-Agent string from request header

ipAddress.description: Client IP address (respecting X-Forwarded-For if present)

authType.description: How the user authenticated (JWT token vs API key)

clientType.description:
Parsed client type from User-Agent or custom Kavita header
Examples: Web App, OPDS Reader, KOReader, Tachiyomi, etc.

appVersion.description: Application version (from web app or mobile app)

browser.description: Browser name (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) - Web clients only

screenWidth.description: Screen width in pixels - Web clients only

screenHeight.description: Screen height in pixels - Web clients only

orientation.description: Screen orientation (portrait, landscape) - Web clients only

seriesIds.description: Series Ids to add onto Collection Tag

ColorScapeDto.description: A set of colors for the color scape system in the UI

platform.description: Platform of the device. If not know, defaults to "Custom"

smartFilterEncoded.description: If Not IsProvided, the appropriate smart filter

DecodeFilterDto.description: For requesting an encoded filter to be decoded

path.description: Path of the Folder the files reside in

name.description: A name given to this device

emailAddress.description: An email address associated with the device (ie Kindle). Will be used with Send to functionality

EmailDeviceDto.description: A Device is an entity that can receive data from Kavita (kindle)

EmailTestResultDto.description: Represents if Test Email Service URL was successful or not and if any error occured

ExternalChapterDto.description: Information about an individual issue/chapter/book from Kavita+

provider.description: Misleading name but is the source of data (like a review coming from AniList)

chapterDtos.description: Only from CBR for API.Services.Plus.ScrobbleProvider.Cbr. Full metadata about issues

provider.description: Misleading name but is the source of data (like a review coming from AniList)

blacklist.description: Do not allow any Genre/Tag in this list to be written to Kavita

whitelist.description: Only allow these Tags to be written to Kavita

ageRatingMappings.description: Any Genres or Tags that if present, will trigger an Age Rating Override. Highest rating will be prioritized for matching.

fieldMappings.description: A list of rules that allow mapping a genre/tag to another genre/tag

FieldMappingsDto.description:
Decoupled from API.DTOs.KavitaPlus.Metadata.MetadataSettingsDto to allow reuse without requiring the full metadata settings in
API.DTOs.Settings.ImportFieldMappingsDto

ageRatingConflicts.description: Keys of the conflicting age ratings mappings

fileName.description: The filename of the cached file. If this was nested in a subfolder, the foldername will be appended with _

format.description: Represents the format of the file

items.description: Represents the format of the file

formats.description: The type of Formats you want to be returned. An empty list will return all formats back

libraries.description: A list of library ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all libraries by passing empty list

genres.description: A list of Genre ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all genres by passing an empty list

writers.description: A list of Writers to restrict search to. Defaults to all Writers by passing an empty list

penciller.description: A list of Penciller ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Pencillers by passing an empty list

inker.description: A list of Inker ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Inkers by passing an empty list

colorist.description: A list of Colorist ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Colorists by passing an empty list

letterer.description: A list of Letterer ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Letterers by passing an empty list

coverArtist.description: A list of CoverArtist ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all CoverArtists by passing an empty list

editor.description: A list of Editor ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Editors by passing an empty list

publisher.description: A list of Publisher ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Publishers by passing an empty list

character.description: A list of Character ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Characters by passing an empty list

translators.description: A list of Translator ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Translatorss by passing an empty list

collectionTags.description: A list of Collection Tag ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Collection Tags by passing an empty list

tags.description: A list of Tag ids to restrict search to. Defaults to all Tags by passing an empty list

rating.description:
Will return back everything with the rating and above
API.Entities.AppUserRating.Rating

ageRating.description: Age Ratings. Empty list will return everything back

languages.description: Languages (ISO 639-1 code) to filter by. Empty list will return everything back

publicationStatus.description: Publication statuses to filter by. Empty list will return everything back

seriesNameQuery.description: An optional name string to filter by. Empty string will ignore.

field.description: Represents the field which will dictate the value type and the Extension used for filtering

limitTo.description: Limit the number of rows returned. Defaults to not applying a limit (aka 0)

FilterV2Dto.description: Metadata filtering for v2 API only

FullProgressDto.description: A full progress Record from the DB (not all data, only what's needed for API)

minHours.description: Min hours to read the selection

maxHours.description: Max hours to read the selection

avgHours.description: Estimated average hours to read the selection

HourEstimateRangeDto.description: A range of time to read a selection (series, chapter, etc)

importMode.description: How Kavita should import the new settings

resolution.description: Default conflict resolution, override with API.DTOs.ImportSettingsDto.AgeRatingConflictResolutions and !:FieldMappingsConflictResolutions

ageRatingConflictResolutions.description: Override the API.DTOs.ImportSettingsDto.Resolution for specific age ratings

Int32Range.description: Represents a range between two int/float/double

roles.description:
List of Roles to assign to user. If admin not present, Pleb will be applied.
If admin present, all libraries will be granted access and will ignore those from DTO.

libraries.description: A list of libraries to grant access to

emailLink.description: Email link used to setup the user account

emailSent.description: Was an email sent (ie is this server accessible)

invalidEmail.description: When a user has an invalid email and is attempting to perform a flow.

title.description: Human Readable title for the Job

lastExecutionUtc.description: Last time the job was run

size.description: Number of items in this Key

key.description: Code to use in URL (url encoded)

JumpKeyDto.description: Represents an individual button in a Jump Bar

document.description: This is the Koreader hash of the book. It is used to identify the book.

device_id.description: A randomly generated id from the koreader device. Only used to maintain the Koreader interface.

device.description: The Koreader device name. Only used to maintain the Koreader interface.

percentage.description: Percent progress of the book. Only used to maintain the Koreader interface.

progress.description:
An XPath string read by Koreader to determine the location within the epub.
Essentially, it is Koreader's equivalent to ProgressDto.BookScrollId.

timestamp.description: Last Progress in Unix seconds since epoch

KoreaderBookDto.description:
This is the interface for receiving and sending updates to Koreader. The only fields
that are actually used are the Document and Progress fields.

document.description: This is the Koreader hash of the book. It is used to identify the book.

timestamp.description: UTC Timestamp to return to KOReader

coverImage.description: An optional Cover Image or null

folderWatching.description: If Folder Watching is enabled for this library

includeInDashboard.description: Include Library series on Dashboard Streams

includeInRecommended.description: Include Library series on Recommended Streams

manageCollections.description: Should this library create and manage collections from Metadata

manageReadingLists.description: Should this library create and manage reading lists from Metadata

allowScrobbling.description: Should this library allow Scrobble events to emit from it

collapseSeriesRelationships.description: When showing series, only parent series or series with no relationships will be returned

items.description: Represents a set of file types that can be scanned

libraryFileTypes.description: The types of file type groups the library will scan for

excludePatterns.description: A set of globs that will exclude matching content from being scanned

allowMetadataMatching.description: Allow any series within this Library to download metadata.

enableMetadata.description: Allow Kavita to read metadata (ComicInfo.xml, Epub, PDF)

removePrefixForSortName.description: Should Kavita remove sort articles "The" for the sort name

expirationDate.description: If cancelled, will represent cancellation date. If not, will represent repayment date

isCancelled.description: If will be or is cancelled

isValidVersion.description: Is the installed version valid for Kavita+ (aka within 3 releases)

totalMonthsSubbed.description: Number of months user has been subscribed

hasLicense.description: A license is stored within Kavita

installId.description: InstallId which can be given to support

apiKey.description: If ApiKey is passed, will ignore username/password for validation

existingId.description: If an existing collection exists within Kavita

MalStackDto.description: Represents an Interest Stack from MAL

accessToken.description: This is actually the Client Id

MalUserInfoDto.description: Information about a User's MAL connection

matchStateOption.description: Represents an option in the UI layer for Filtering

libraryType.description: Library Type in int form. -1 indicates to ignore the field.

filePath.description: Absolute path to the archive file (normalized)

pages.description: Number of pages for the given file

bytes.description: How many bytes make up this file

format.description: Represents the format of the file

koreaderHash.description: A hash of the document using Koreader's unique hashing algorithm

value.description: Represents the format of the file

volumeIds.description: A list of Volumes to mark read

chapterIds.description: A list of additional Chapters to mark as read

MarkVolumesReadDto.description: This is used for bulk updating a set of volume and or chapters in one go

dontMatch.description: When set, Kavita will stop attempting to match this series and will not perform any scrobbling

seriesId.description: Series Id to pull internal metadata from to improve matching

query.description: Free form text to query for. Can be a url and ids will be parsed from it

MatchSeriesDto.description: Used for matching a series with Kavita+ for metadata and scrobbling

filePath.description: Full Filepath to the file that has some issue

isPending.description: If the member is still pending or not

identityProvider.description: Who provides the identity of the user

MemberDto.description: Represents a member of a Kavita server.

destinationValue.description: Write the string as this in the Destination (can also just be the Source)

excludeFromSource.description: If true, the tag will be Moved over vs Copied over

blacklist.description: Do not allow any Genre/Tag in this list to be written to Kavita

whitelist.description: Only allow these Tags to be written to Kavita

ageRatingMappings.description: Any Genres or Tags that if present, will trigger an Age Rating Override. Highest rating will be prioritized for matching.

fieldMappings.description: A list of rules that allow mapping a genre/tag to another genre/tag

enabled.description: If writing any sort of metadata from upstream (AniList, Hardcover) source is allowed

enableExtendedMetadataProcessing.description: Enable processing of metadata outside K+; e.g. disk and API

enableSummary.description: Allow the Summary to be written

enablePublicationStatus.description: Allow Publication status to be derived and updated

enableRelationships.description: Allow Relationships between series to be set

enablePeople.description: Allow People to be created (including downloading images)

enableStartDate.description: Allow Start date to be set within the Series

enableChapterSummary.description: Allow Summary to be set within Chapter/Issue

enableChapterReleaseDate.description: Allow Release Date to be set within Chapter/Issue

enableChapterTitle.description: Allow Title to be set within Chapter/Issue

enableChapterPublisher.description: Allow Publisher to be set within Chapter/Issue

enableChapterCoverImage.description: Allow setting the cover image for the Chapter/Issue

firstLastPeopleNaming.description: For Authors and Writers, how should names be stored (Exclusively applied for AniList). This does not affect Character names.

items.description: Represents which field that can be written to as an override when already locked

overrides.description: A list of overrides that will enable writing to locked fields

personRoles.description: Which Roles to allow metadata downloading for

title.description: The localized title to render on the card

autoLogin.description: Automatically redirect to the Oidc login screen

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Disables password authentication for non-admin users

providerName.description: Name of your provider, used to display on the login screen

authority.description: Optional OpenID Connect Authority URL. Not managed in DB. Managed in appsettings.json and synced to DB.

clientId.description: Optional OpenID Connect ClientId, defaults to kavita. Not managed in DB. Managed in appsettings.json and synced to DB.

secret.description: Optional OpenID Connect Secret. Not managed in DB. Managed in appsettings.json and synced to DB.

provisionAccounts.description: If true, auto creates a new account when someone logs in via OpenID Connect

requireVerifiedEmail.description: Require emails to be verified by the OpenID Connect provider when creating accounts on login

syncUserSettings.description: Overwrite Kavita roles, libraries and age rating with OpenIDConnect provided roles on log in.

rolesPrefix.description: A prefix that all roles Kavita checks for during sync must have

rolesClaim.description: The JWT claim roles are mapped under, defaults to System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role

customScopes.description: Custom scopes Kavita should request from your OIDC provider

enabled.description: Returns true if the !:OidcPublicConfigDto.Authority has been set

autoLogin.description: Automatically redirect to the Oidc login screen

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Disables password authentication for non-admin users

providerName.description: Name of your provider, used to display on the login screen

results.description: The requested name to the parsed result. Does not include errored items

errors.description: The requested name to parse maps to the Error exception

name.description: The persons name in the form. In case it differs from the one in the database

webLinks.description: Web links derived from the various id of external websites

roles.description: All roles as if returned by the /api/person/roles endpoint

destId.description: The id of the person being merged into

srcId.description: The id of the person being merged. This person will be removed, and become an alias of API.DTOs.PersonMergeDto.DestId

PersonSortOptions.description: All Sorting Options for a query related to Person Entity

title.description: The title of the bookmark. Defaults to Page {PageNumber} if not set

bookScrollId.description: For Book Reader, represents the nearest passed anchor on the screen that can be used to resume scroll point. If empty, the ToC point is the beginning of the page

chapterTitle.description: Title of the Chapter this PToC was created in

bookScrollId.description:
For EPUB reader, this can be an optional string of the id of a part marker, to help resume reading position
on pages that combine multiple "chapters".

provider.description: Misleading name but is the source of data (like a review coming from AniList)

ReadHistoryEvent.description: Represents a single User's reading event

ReadStatus.description: Represents the Reading Status. This is a flag and allows multiple statues

seriesFormat.description: Represents the format of the file

promoted.description: Reading lists that are promoted are only done by admins

coverImage.description: This is used to tell the UI if it should request a Cover Image or not. If null or empty, it has not been set.

itemCount.description: Number of Items in the Reading List

startingYear.description: Minimum Year the Reading List starts

startingMonth.description: Minimum Month the Reading List starts

endingYear.description: Maximum Year the Reading List starts

endingMonth.description: Maximum Month the Reading List starts

ageRating.description: The highest age rating from all Series within the reading list

ownerUserName.description: Username of the User that owns (in the case of a promoted list)

pages.description: Total Pages across all Reading List Items

wordCount.description: Total Word count across all Reading List Items

isAllEpub.description: Are ALL Reading List Items epub

seriesFormat.description: Represents the format of the file

lastReadingProgressUtc.description: The last time a reading list item (underlying chapter) was read by current authenticated user

title.description: This will automatically map to Volume X, Chapter Y, etc.

chapterId.description: Chapter Id if this is a chapter. Not guaranteed to be set.

volumeId.description: Volume Id if this is a chapter. Not guaranteed to be set.

id.description: This is used only on the UI. It is just index of being added.

format.description: Represents the format of the file

RecentlyAddedItemDto.description: A mesh of data for Recently added volume/chapters

forceColorscape.description: Should the task force re-calculation of colorscape.

RefreshSeriesDto.description: Used for running some task against a Series.

email.description: An email to register with. Optional. Provides Forgot Password functionality

timePrompt.description: If the prompt is triggered because of time, false when triggered because of fully read

fullReread.description: True if the entity is not atomic and will be fully reread on reread (I.e. rereading a series on volume)

daysSinceLastRead.description: Days elapsed since API.DTOs.Reader.RereadDto.ChapterOnReread was last read

oldPassword.description: The old, existing password. If an admin is performing the change, this is not required. Otherwise, it is.

apiKey.description: Api key for a user with Admin permissions

abortOnNoSeriesMatch.description: If true, only runs the scan if a matches series is found. I.e. prevent library scans

ScanFolderDto.description: DTO for requesting a folder to be scanned

details.description: List of providers that could not

isDescending.description: If the sort should be a descending sort

includeReviews.description: Include reviews in the result - Note: Review Scrobbling is disabled

format.description: Represents the format of the file

SearchResultGroupDto.description: Represents all Search results for a query

specials.description: Specials for the Series. These will have their title and range cleaned to remove the special marker and prepare

chapters.description: All Chapters, excluding Specials and single chapters (0 chapter) for a volume

volumes.description: Just the Volumes for the Series (Excludes Volume 0)

storylineChapters.description: These are chapters that are in Volume 0 and should be read AFTER the volumes

SeriesDetailDto.description:
This is a special DTO for a UI page in Kavita. This performs sorting and grouping and returns exactly what UI requires for layout.
This is subject to change, do not rely on this Data model.

SeriesDetailPlusDto.description: All the data from Kavita+ for Series Detail

hasUserRated.description: If the user has set the rating or not

pagesRead.description: Sum of pages read from linked Volumes. Calculated at API-time.

latestReadDate.description: DateTime representing last time the series was Read. Calculated at API-time.

format.description: Represents the format of the file

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Series

ageRating.description: Highest Age Rating from all Chapters

maxCount.description: Max number of issues/volumes in the series (Max of Volume/Issue field in ComicInfo)

totalCount.description: Total number of issues/volumes for the series

ageRatingLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override AgeRating

publicationStatusLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override PublicationStatus

provider.description: Misleading name but is the source of data (like a review coming from AniList)

installId.description: Unique Id that represents a unique install

isDocker.description: If the Kavita install is using Docker

firstInstallDate.description: The Date Kavita was first installed

firstInstallVersion.description: The Version of Kavita on the first run

ServerInfoSlimDto.description: This is just for the Server tab on UI

loggingLevel.description: Logging level for server. Managed in appsettings.json.

port.description: Port the server listens on. Managed in appsettings.json.

ipAddresses.description: Comma separated list of ip addresses the server listens on. Managed in appsettings.json

allowStatCollection.description: Allows anonymous information to be collected and sent to KavitaStats

enableOpds.description: Enables OPDS connections to be made to the server.

baseUrl.description: Base Url for the kavita. Requires restart to take effect.

installId.description: Represents a unique Id to this Kavita installation. Only used in Stats to identify unique installs.

encodeMediaAs.description: The format that should be used when saving media for Kavita
encodeMediaAs.example: This includes things like: Covers, Bookmarks, Favicons

totalBackups.description: The amount of Backups before cleanup

enableFolderWatching.description: If Kavita should watch the library folders and process changes

totalLogs.description: Total number of days worth of logs to keep at a given time.

hostName.description: The Host name (ie Reverse proxy domain name) for the server

cacheSize.description: The size in MB for Caching API data

onDeckProgressDays.description: How many Days since today in the past for reading progress, should content be considered for On Deck, before it gets removed automatically

onDeckUpdateDays.description: How many Days since today in the past for chapter updates, should content be considered for On Deck, before it gets removed automatically

coverImageSize.description: How large the cover images should be

pdfRenderResolution.description: How large rendered PDF images should be

firstInstallDate.description: The Date Kavita was first installed

firstInstallVersion.description: The Version of Kavita on the first run

statsApiHits.description: How many times Kavita has hit the Stats API

smartFilterEncoded.description: If Not IsProvided, the appropriate smart filter

fileName.description:
File path to the content. Stored under API.Services.DirectoryService.SiteThemeDirectory.
Must be a .css file

isDefault.description: Only one theme can have this. Will auto-set this as default for new user accounts

provider.description: Where did the theme come from

author.description: Author of the Theme (only applies to non-system provided themes)

compatibleVersion.description: Last compatible version. System provided will always be most current

SiteThemeDto.description: Represents a set of css overrides the user can upload to Kavita and will load into webui

filter.description: This is the Filter url encoded. It is decoded and reconstructed into a API.DTOs.Filtering.v2.FilterV2Dto

sizeLimit.description: Limit in bytes for allowing files to be added as attachments. Defaults to 25MB

customizedTemplates.description: Should Kavita use config/templates for Email templates or the default ones

files.description: The files that represent this Chapter

pagesRead.description: Calculated at API time. Number of pages read for this Chapter for logged-in user.

lastReadingProgressUtc.description: The last time a chapter was read by current authenticated user

lastReadingProgress.description: The last time a chapter was read by current authenticated user

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Series

StatBucketDto.description: A bucket of items (fixed) from 0-X, X-X*2

comicsTime.description: Amount of time read on Comic libraries

tags.description: Collection of all Tags from underlying chapters for a Chapter

ageRating.description: Highest Age Rating from all Chapters

ageRatingLocked.description: Locked by user so metadata updates from scan loop will not override AgeRating

sortOrder.description: The sorting order of the Chapter. Inherits from MinNumber, but can be overridden.

sortOrderLocked.description: Can the sort order be updated on scan or is it locked from UI

webLinks.description: Comma-separated link of urls to external services that have some relation to the Chapter

platform.description: Platform of the device. If not know, defaults to "Custom"

items.description: Represents a set of file types that can be scanned

fileGroupTypes.description: What types of files to allow the scanner to pickup

excludePatterns.description: A set of Glob patterns that the scanner will exclude processing

isDocker.description: If this install is within Docker

isOnNightlyInRelease.description: Is the server on a nightly within this release

isReleaseNewer.description: Is the server on an older version

isReleaseEqual.description: Is the server on this version

blogPart.description: The part above the changelog part

UpdateNotificationDto.description: Update Notification denoting a new release available for user to update to

UpdateReadingListPosition.description: DTO for moving a reading list item to another position within the same list

positionIncludesInvisible.description: If the API.DTOs.Dashboard.UpdateStreamPositionDto.ToPosition has taken into account non-visible items

roles.description:
List of Roles to assign to user. If admin not present, Pleb will be applied.
If admin present, all libraries will be granted access and will ignore those from DTO.

libraries.description: A list of libraries to grant access to

identityProvider.description: Who provides the identity of the user

seriesIds.description: List of Series Ids that will be Added/Removed

UpdateWantToReadDto.description: A list of Series to pass when working with Want To Read APIs

url.description: Base Url encoding of the file to upload from (can be null)

identityProvider.description: Who provides the identity of the user

pageSize.description: If set to 0, will set as MaxInt

UserParams.description:
User params should be used together with [FromQuery] to add optional pagination to endpoint. If no pagination params are
provided, the default (int.MaxValue) will be used. When adding pagination to an endpoint, ensure the UI sets the correct
query params.

bookReaderWritingStyle.description: Represents the writing styles for the book-reader

bodyJustText.description: The main body with just text, for review preview

libraryId.description: The library this series belongs in

userId.description: UserId of the reviewer, only applicable for API.Services.Plus.ScrobbleProvider.Kavita

score.description: How many upvotes this review has gotten

siteUrl.description: If External, the url of the review

isExternal.description: Does this review come from an external Source

provider.description: If this review is External, which Provider did it come from

UserReviewDto.description: Represents a User Review for a given Series

libraryId.description: The library this series belongs in

UserTokenInfo.description: Represents information around a user's tokens and their status

number.description: This will map to MinNumber. Number was removed in v0.7.13.8/v0.7.14

created.description: When chapter was created in local server time

lastModified.description: When chapter was last modified in local server time

AuthKey.description: Auth Key authentication. Enter your Auth key from your user settings
AuthKey.name: x-api-key

tags.name: Account
tags.description: All Account matters

tags.name: Collection
tags.description: APIs for Collections

tags.name: Deprecated
tags.description: All APIs here are subject to be removed and are no longer maintained. Will be removed v0.9.0

tags.name: WantToRead
tags.description: Responsible for all things Want To Read

tags.name: Device
tags.description: Responsible interacting and creating Devices

tags.name: Download
tags.description: All APIs related to downloading entities from the system. Requires Download Role or Admin Role.

tags.name: Image
tags.description: Responsible for servicing up images stored in Kavita for entities

tags.name: Koreader
tags.description: The endpoint to interface with Koreader's Progress Sync plugin.

tags.name: Manage
tags.description: All things centered around Managing the Kavita instance, that isn't aligned with an entity

tags.name: Panels
tags.description: For the Panels app explicitly

tags.name: Rating
tags.description: Responsible for providing external ratings for Series

tags.name: Reader
tags.description: For all things regarding reading, mainly focusing on non-Book related entities

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Responsible for the Search interface from the UI

tags.name: Stream
tags.description: Responsible for anything that deals with Streams (SmartFilters, ExternalSource, DashboardStream, SideNavStream)

tags.name: Tachiyomi
tags.description:
All APIs are for Tachiyomi extension and app. They have hacks for our implementation and should not be used for any
other purposes.
